DOC.brief_summary: Patients with an episode of depression in late life prescribed mirtazapine recruited from a clinical sample will be monitored for weight and receive a blood test during their usual course of treatment to determine polymorphisms in a specific gene (LEPR) thought to affect weight gain.
DOC.brief_title: LEPR Polymorphism Weight Gain by Mirtazapine in Late Life Depression
